org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.provisional.core An earlier framework for calling validators that are build based.

Subinterfaces of IValidationContext in org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.provisional.core
 interface IMetaModelContext
           Provisional API: This class/interface is part of an interim API that is still under development and expected to change significantly before reaching stability.
 interface IProjectValidationContext
          IProjectValidationContext extends IValidationContext to provide access to a reference to the project on which a validator is being invoked.
